FuncDef:
The peer pw command creates PWs in a VSI.
The undo peer pw command deletes PWs in a VSI.
By default, no PW is created in a VSI.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a peer IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of a PW.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create PWs in the BGP-AD view of a VSI, run the peer pw command.
